mapper.update: UPDATE HOLIDAY SET holiday_lunar=#{holidayLunar}, holiday_date=#{holidayDate}, holiday_title=#{holidayTitle} WHERE holiday_id=#{holidayID}
mapper.select: SELECT holiday_id holidayID, CAST(holiday_lunar AS SIGNED) holidayLunar, holiday_date holidayDate, holiday_title holidayTitle FROM HOLIDAY ORDER BY holiday_date ASC;
